attributes.action: Ban the selling and manufacturing of disposable vape pens
attributes.additional_details: Disposable pens are designed to be used for one day then you buy another one. So if one person uses this product every day for a year (365 vape pens) leads to tones of plastics ending up in landfill with all the chemicals in the battery’s leaking into the ground Bring in a law to stop the pointless manufacturing of products that are only designed to be used ones and then thrown away when there are already products out there that do the same job and can be repaired, recharged and used again.
attributes.background: We are trying to be a greener planet and reduce are waist and stop single use plastics. These vape pens are only adding to the problem. They are they a single use plastic they contain single use batteries which this a resource needed to be saved for important thing that will help to save the planet.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612333
